attributes.action: Fill in all the potholes in Aldershot
attributes.background:
It is very dangerous and the potholes are becoming very large!
This needs to be fixed!

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of your local council. You might want to contact them about this issue. 

Hampshire County Council have their own petitions site which can be found here: https://www.hants.gov.uk/aboutthecouncil/haveyoursay/petitions
